meanings.definition: The pigmented vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera.
meanings.sent1: The choroids help supply blood to the eye.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the choroids to understand eye health.
meanings.sent3: The choroids decided to throw a party for the retina and sclera.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the vibrant choroids of the eye.
meanings.sent5: The choroids, like a hidden garden, nourish the eye with life.

meanings.definition: A network of blood vessels in the choroid coat of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The choroids carry nutrients to the eye tissues.
meanings.sent2: An ophthalmologist examines the choroids during an eye check-up.
meanings.sent3: The choroids in the eye had a race to see who could deliver blood faster.
meanings.sent4: The choroids intertwined like a complex web of life within the eye.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red of the choroids painted a picture of vitality in the eye.
